full_summary:
= Government Tender Announcement:
## F1022-230004 - Laboratory Casework 

 Officer Note: 
Tender number: WS4373757830
Amendment number: 3
Publication date: 2024-01-19
Closing date: **14:00:00 (Eastern Time) on 29 April 2024** 
Amendment date: 2024-04-24

**Procurement Summary**

* The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires the supply and installation of modular laboratory casework systems.
* Systems will be required to replace existing benchtops and casework, as well as reconfigure laboratory room layouts as needed.
* Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the RFP.

**Contract Details**

* Contract category: Goods & Services 
* Procurement method: Competitive bidding
* Contract duration: Up to April 30, 2027 (unless mutually agreed upon)
* Contract types: Standing offer
* The contractor will provide laboratory casework systems which meet the RFP's specifications
* The contractor is required to replace existing benchtops and casework, as well as reconfigure laboratory room layouts as required

**Additional Requirements**

* Respondents must meet the eligibility criteria specified in the RFP.
* Suppliers must comply with the Trade Agreements under Canadian law, including:
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) 
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) 
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) 
* The contract will commence and end on the expected dates (not specified) in the contract notice); maximum contract duration is 3 years

**Tender Contact**
For all inquiries and requests, please contact:
Katie Wong ( she/her)
Designated Contracting Authority
Public Services and Procurement Canada/Ministère des Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada
Email: [katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
